Items.Name: ELPRO Elektroanlagen Behncke GmbH
Items.Description:
Our main focus  is on developing sophisticated applications for all industries. 
You will find satisfied customers in a wide variety of industries: e.g. 
chemistry, pharmacy, food, oil and gas to name a few. We offer all services 
during a projects lifecycle: engineering, installation, commissioning, support, 
maintenance, update and migration. Furthermore we have experience of course 
with 800xA (e.g. with AC800M controller), Freelance (e.g. AC800F), Melody (with 
800xA), Advant OCS (AdvaCommand for Unix) and several other controller types, 
e.g. AC450, AC100, AC500.

Items.Name: Emb Service GmbH Elektromaschinenbau
Items.Description:
Unser Angebot auf dem Gebiet der Elektromotoren umfasst neben den klassischen Gleich- und Drehstrommotoren auch ein breites Spektrum an Servomotoren und Motoren in Sonderbauformen sowie Generatoren.
 
Unser Serviceteam steht Ihnen an 365 Tagen 24 Stunden zur Verfügung. Zu den Aufgaben gehören Reparaturen und Modifikationen in unserer Werkstatt und auch vor Ort in Ihrer Anlage. Condition Monitoring und Auswuchtarbeiten runden das Spektrum entsprechend ab.
 
Wird ein neuer Motor benötigt wenden Sie sich an unser kompetentes Vertriebsteam. Eine Auslegung nach Ihren Wünschen und energetischen Gesichtspunkten ist selbstverständlich. Der Austausch alter, nicht genormter Maschinen und erforderliche Modifizierungs- und Automatisierungsarbeiten sind willkommene Herausforderungen.

Items.Description:
EMCO Engineering is an international water solutions provider. For the past 3 decades, we have focused on and excelled in providing innovative water and wastewater treatment solutions to our clients across the globe.

EMCO Controls is a specialized business unit with EMCO dedicated to providing Process Automation and Digital solutions for Industries and utilities.

Items.Name: EMS Elektromotoren GmbH
Items.Description:
Wir sind ein mittelständisches Unternehmen mit mehr als 30 Jahren Branchenerfahrung im Bereich Service, Reparatur und Wartung elektrischer Antriebe und Komponenten.

Individuelle Beratung, Leistungsbereitschaft und Kompetenz sind die Grundlagen unseres Erfolges.

Dienstleistungsangebot:
Beratung
Sachkundigenprüfung
Service und Wartung
Umbau und Überholung
Prüfung und Diagnose
Ersatzbeschaffung
Abhol- und Lieferservice
NEU: Kompetenzschulungen

Items.Name: EMSR Industrieautomation GmbH
Items.Description:
We provide complete delivery and commissioning of all automation equipment, as well as services for engineering, support, maintenance, update and expansion of existing systems.

We offer to our customers turnkey solutions of automation products for various projects and technological units.

Sales, Support and Engineering capabilities for Melody/AC870P, AC450, AC110, AC160 available

Items.Name: Emt Electrical And Mechanical Techniques Jsc
ENCOSO GmbH
Items.Description:
Die ENCOSO GmbH ist ein herstellerunabhängiges Planungsbüro für den Anlagen- und Maschinenbau, im bayerischen Burghausen. 

Die fachliche Spezialisierung liegt in der Prozessleit- und Automatisierungstechnik, sowie der Mess-, Steuer- und Regeltechnik. 

Trotz des jungen Alters kann die ENCOSO GmbH auf langjährige Erfahrung zurückblicken und ein hervorragendes Know-how vorweisen. 

Gegründet wurde die Firma im Oktober 2010. Angewachsen auf mittlerweile 20 Mitarbeiter kann die ENCOSO GmbH eine gemeinsame Projekterfahrung von über 250 Jahren vorweisen. 
Wir arbeiten für die Prozess- und Fertigungsindustrie in verschiedenen Branchen: 

• Chemische Industrie 
• Öl- und Gasindustrie 
• Nahrungsmittelindustrie 
• Kraftwerkstechnik 
• Umwelttechnik 
• Solar-Industrie 

Die unterschiedlichen, erfolgreich abgeleisteten Referenzprojekte sprechen für die langjährige Erfahrung unserer Mitarbeiter. 

Unsere Leistungen 

• Prozessleit- und Automatisierungstechnik 
• Elektro-, Mess-, Steuer- und Regeltechnik 
• Softwareentwicklung 
• Individual-Programmierung 

Wir sind Ihr zuverlässiger Partner bei der Durchführung ihrer Projekte - von der Planung über projektbezogene Personalunterstützung, bis hin zur Realisierung. 

In allen Planungsphasen legen wir höchsten Wert auf Wirtschaftlichkeit, Nachhaltigkeit und Innovation. 

Die Anlagen werden selbstverständlich nach umweltrelevanten Aspekten geplant. 

Wir garantieren ihnen schon jetzt Zuverlässigkeit, Qualität und Termintreue - in allen Projektphasen. 

The competence of engineering!

Items.Name: Energopromis Ltd
Items.Description:
Today ENERGOPROMIS Ltd. is a multiprofile company with personnel of over 70 people. We have more than 20 years experience in the fields of Industrial Process Control Automation, Relay Protection and Substation Automation at industrial enterprises of the Republic of Belarus. Comprehensive approach to automation tasks has always been and remains a fundamental principle of our work. Highly qualified specialists offer complete “turnkey” solutions for the variety of industries, including power generation and transmission, oil refining, design engineering, construction, etc.

We’ve established solid partner relations with ABB Group – world’s leader in power equipment, instrumentation, automation and control products manufacturing.

Items.Name: Erwin Reumuller TEWA Elektromotorengesellschaft m.b.H.
Items.Description:
Seit Jänner 1990 sind wir in unserem neuen Betriebsgelände, in Wien 23 (im 
Zentrum von Atzgersdorf), mit derzeit 15 Mitarbeiter + Chef vergrößern wir 
laufend unser Handelswarenprogramm. Die langjährige Erfahrung in der 
Motorbranche (seit 1.1.1974 - Fa. Reumüller und davor Schwiegereltern seit 
1940) erleichtert uns die Auswahl der Materialien, welche in der Wickelei und 
in der Motorreparatur benötigt werden. Seit Anfang 1997 haben wir 2 neue 
Mitarbeiter, die noch intensiver unsere Kunden flächendeckend in Österreich 
betreuen. Einerseits durch Beratung und andererseits durch wöchentliche 
Zustelldienste, im Bereich Wien, Oberösterreich/Salzburg und Niederösterreich/
Burgenland/Steiermark/Kärnten. Unsere Kunden in Tirol und Vorarlberg vergessen 
wir natürlich nicht, diese werden weiterhin mittels Spedition und Post 
beliefert. Neben unserem Motor -und Ersatzteillager übernimmt die hauseigene 
Werkstätte sämtliche Reparaturen, Motorüber- holungen, Umwicklungen und 
Neuwicklungen von Drehstrom -, Wechselstrom -, Gleichstrom -, Getriebemotoren , 
usw. Weiters rüsten wir Maschinen mit veralterter Antriebstechnik 
(Gleichstromantriebe, Regelgetriebe, Schleifringläufer) auf neue wartungsfreie, 
frequenzgeregelte Antriebe oder bürstenlose Servomotoren um.

Items.Name: ESA Elektro Automation GmbH
Items.Description:
Die ESA Elektro-Automation GmbH beliefert seit Ihrer Gründung 1991 - sowohl 
national als auch international - verschiedene Branchen mit elektrotechnischen 
Anlagen und individueller Software für Automatisierungssysteme. Unser Ziel ist 
es, effektive und individuelle Lösungen zu bieten und die Bedürfnisse unserer 
Kunden zu erkennen und umzusetzen. Das Unternehmen hat ein junges Team von 75 
Mitarbeitern und befindet sich seit Ende 2000 durch die Errichtung eines neuen 
Firmengebäudes an seinem neuen Standort in Viehdorf bei Amstetten. Neben der 
Lieferung von Komplettanlagen (Planung, Bau der Schaltanlagen, Programmierung 
der Steuerungen, Inbetriebnahme) vertreibt ESA weiters Hard- und 
Softwarekomponenten für die Automatisierungstechnik. Der Einsatz neuester und 
hochwertiger Produkte sowie unser Know-How in den branchenspezifischen 
Fertigungsprozessen garantiert den Erfolg des Unternehmens. Mit Juli 2001 
erweitert die Fa. ESA ihr Geschäftsfeld und vertreibt und supported als 
Vertriebspartner der Fa. ABB Frequenzumrichter der Reihen ACS.

Items.Name: Euro S.E.I. Servizi Elettromeccanici Industriali s.a.s.
Items.Description:
Euro SEI, established in 2002, supports maintenance of manufacturing plants of Metal, Plastic and Rubber, Paper, Energy, and in general all process plants with a consistent level of automation and control.
Based on our motto, Service, Expertise, Innovation, our mission is to provide always the right choice and its technical advice to replace properly (and possibly with the most updated technology) all components requiring maintenance or replacement.
In this respect, you will find by us all required technical support to replace obsolete ABB instruments and competitor models and to implement latest available technologies to keep control system of your process to the state of art. 

Euro SEI, fondata nel 2002, coadiuva la manutenzione degli impianti produttivi di Metalli, Plastica e Gomma, Carta, Energia, e in generale di tutti gli impianti di processo con un elevato livello di automazione e controllo.
Basandoci sul nostro motto, Servizio, Esperienza, Innovazione, la nostra missione è quella di fornire sempre la giusta scelta e relativa informazione tecnica per sostituire in modo appropriato (e possibilmente con la più avanzata tecnologia) tutta la componentistica che richieda manutenzione o sostituzione.
Per questo troverete da noi tutto il necessario supporto tecnico per sostituire strumenti ABB obsoleti e modelli della concorrenza e per implementare l’ultima tecnologia disponibile per mantenere il sistema di controllo del vostro processo allo stato dell’arte.

Items.Name: Eurotec S.r.l.
Items.Description:
EUROTEC, present in the instrumentation and automation market since 1988, has become fundamental for the safety of industrial processes. 
The philosophy is to provide its customers not only equipment, but also technical support in terms of advice and assistance. 

EUROTEC can boast specific experiences in the most different sectors energy, chemical, petrochemical, food, pharmaceutical, water management and distribution , plastics molding, analysis and temperature for liquids, gases and powders, adjustments and controls of various process parameters from the individual loops to DCS.

Items.Name: EVANS ENTERPRISES INC
Items.Description: Plant opened in 1974. Now employs 65 people. 100 ton crane capacity. 19,000 horsepower Phenix test set 8 foot VPI. Rewinding equipment to 15 kV. Laser alignment and dynamic balancing to 20,000 pounds.

Items.Name: Evans Enterprises Inc
Items.Description: Built in 1985, Evans Fort Smith has expanded five times in the last ten years and is in the process of expanding a sixth tine with an eight thousand square foot ware house to store customers critical motors in a climate controlled environment. In addition, we've built a climate controlled winding/assembly room to control the environment where. We employ the latest technology in field services with our state of the art PDMA motor circuit testing equipment.

Items.Name: Exel Industrial, S.L.
Items.Description:
Compañía fundada en 1990. Especialistas en puestas en marcha, revisiones, 
reparaciones y mantenimiento de convertidores de frecuencia, UPS's, PLC's, 
centrífugas de azúcar, etc... Proyectos y desarrollo de automatizaciones. 
Regulación de procesos. Autómatas programables. Control distribuido.

Items.Name: Expert Tooling & Automation Ltd
Items.Description:
Expert is a global organisation that delivers solutions in the following fields:

Medical & Pharmaceutical
Food & Beverage
Automation FMCG
Automotive
Aerospace
Powertrain
EV
Modular Housing
Composites & Light Weighting
EOL Systems
We are an established and highly respected engineering supplier with headquarters in the UK, delivering bespoke solutions since 1972.

Items.Name: FABRICA MACHINALE S.R.L.
Items.Description:
Fabrica Machinale designs, engineers and offers innovative robotic solutions 
for model shaping and surface finishing. With our know-how and the experience 
gained in more than 20 years in the business, we are able to satisfy every need 
for automation in many different fields, offering custom made robotic solutions 
for every single customer. 
Fabrica Machinale puts on the market robotic system with different 
applications: from the artistic carving of marble to complex shape finishing. 
Thanks to our flexibility our solutions are applied to many industries, like: 

- Stone industry 
- Composite industry 
- Aerospace 
- Automotive 
- Transportation 
- Naval 
- Furniture 
- Artistic 
- Orthopaedic 

Our team is composed of highly trained professionals like engineers 
(mechanical, electrical and software), skilled technicians, marketing 
specialists and sales representatives. Our team currently has a total of 20 
people. Our headquarters are located in Pisa (Italy); we have administrative 
and commercial offices, an R&D laboratory and a brand-new production site, 
where we assemble and test our robotic systems, providing turnkey solutions to 
our customers.

Items.Name: Faisal Jassim Trading Co LLC
Items.Description:
M/s FAISAL JASSIM TRADING CO. L.L.C. was established in 1988, as a partnership 
between a number of qualified engineers, specialized in the Electrical & 
Mechanical fields related to the building services industry.  Faisal Jassim has 
forged for itself a venerable reputation of expertise and excellence in its 
fields of business in particular in Electrical control panels and VFD'S.  Our 
activities are spread between the following divisions:

1. Electrical Control Panels & ABB variable speed drives.
2. Cooling Towers, AHU, Ventilation and York A/C.
3. HVAC Ducting
4. Boiler Equipment and Heat Exchangers
5. Air Distribution Products
6. Pumping Equipment

Faisal Jassim's total staff is around 400 people on their permanent 
employment.  Our service team have been well trained by out principals, to 
start up, commission and service all the equipment we supply.  

Our head office is located in Dubai, with branch offices in Abu Dhabi and 
Qatar. Our workshops and stores are located in Al Quoz, with a total area of  
8,000m2.

Items.Name: Fallas Automation Inc
Items.Description:
Since 1979, Fallas Automation has produced simple, compact case packers and automation support equipment. Our goal is to provide our customers with stress-free automated case packing lines, so you can increase your production and improve your bottom line.


 Fallas Automation celebrated our 40th anniversary in 2019. Dedication to machine quality and customer service are key reasons Fallas has been successful for so long. Fallas started producing semi-automatic case packers in the 1980s, then adapted to the rapidly changing technologies and expanded our catalog of machinery. Today, we provide fully integrated end of line case packing solutions for a variety of products. Markets, machinery, and customer needs have changed. Our heritage of constructing machinery to the highest quality standards and providing the most value for our customers has stayed constant. 

 

Fallas Automation systems can accommodate a variety of plant layouts, products, and customer needs with modular units that provide a successful end of line packaging system. With case erectors, case packers, case sealers, and product handling solutions, we set up each purchased system in our factory in Waco, Texas, before we disassemble and ship to your facility. This allows you to have full confidence that your system works as expected and provides training opportunities for your operators before the machine has arrived at your facility.

Items.Name: Farason Corp
Items.Description:
Farason Corporation provides automation to remove health hazardous, repetitive 
motions; create safer working environments; improve product quality; and boost 
production rates. This results in reduced costs, higher operating efficiencies 
and increased overall net production for our customers.

Items.Name: Finze & Wagner EMSR Ingenieurgesellschaft mbH
Items.Description:
Further services on ABB products:
- engineering with S800, S900 
- Composer/Melody
- Procontrol P14

Items.Name: Fleaux Services Of Louisiana LLC
Items.Description: Fleaux Services provides advanced fabrication, instrumentation, and automation services. We are second to none in the industry due to our strong relationships with manufacturers and our industry expertise. Our fabricated goods are of the utmost quality and meet or exceed industry standards. We partner with trusted quality manufacturers to provide you with the best oil and gas measurement solutions. Make Fleaux Services your first call if you're looking for quality, safety, and longevity over cost.

Items.Name: Flexmill Oy
Items.Description: Flexmill provides intelligent and adaptive equipment for the marine, aerospace, and energy industries. Precision technology is the key to high quality and profitability in manufacturing. Only the most advanced equipment is capable of producing consistent quality.

Items.Name: Flowrond Med S.r.l.
Items.Description:
FLOWROND MED was set up in early 2017 to provide our customers with specialized services tailored to their unique needs. We are a flexible team that has as main field of activity the offering of technical solutions in the field of Measurement and Quality of Natural Gas.

We are a team with over 15 years of experience in the field of measuring and quality natural gas. The experience and the results obtained during these years are supported by the projects designed, executed and put into operation for installations such as Measurement Control Stations, Fiscal Measurement Stations with Ultrasound and Turbine, Deprimogen Multistream Element Measurement Systems, etc., having final beneficiaries Romgaz SA, Transgaz SA, Petrom SA etc.

Items.Name: Foodmach Pty Ltd
Items.Description:
ROBOTICS & AUTOMATION 
FOODMACH is a market leading provider of robotic–based automation solutions and 
is a certified channel partner for ABB of Sweden. 

Our strong solution culture allows us to tailor the right solution to meet your 
specific technical and operational requirements. These solutions help to 
improve productivity, product quality and safety. 

The ability to custom design, test and conduct product trials at our 
manufacturing facilities provide our client’s with confidence and ensure 
minimal disruption to production during installation and commissioning. 

We are able to offer you multiple robotic solution concepts from simple cost 
effective robotic solutions to more sophisticated systems such as Robomatrix®, 
the world’s fastest and most flexible palletising solution. 

FOODMACH is able to provide total packaging line flexibility through picking, 
packing or palletising solutions.

Items.Name: Form Automation Robotics Ltd
Items.Description:
Welcome to Form Automation - Robotic Solutions – where quality and service go 
hand in hand. 

We are an established business that specialise in the supply of robotic 
solutions for production and placement of pads in plastic trays manufactured on 
high-speed plastic production lines.

Form Automation operates primarily in the thermoforming sector of the packaging 
industry and as such has become a leader for in-line pad placement, recommended 
by all leading European thermoforming manufacturers. This has been possible by 
using high speed robots along with developing servo driven machines to 
manufacture cut pad.

Form Automation is now developing stacking, downstream packing and palletising 
solutions.

Whatever your brief, however large or small your project, Form Automation will 
find an engineering solution - It’s what we’re good at.

Items.Name: FVB Sverige AB
Items.Description:
FVB är en koncern där FVB Sverige AB är moderbolag, med delägda bolag i USA och Kanada.

FVB utför konsultuppdrag med fokus på energi, fastighet och industri, inom verksamhetsområdena Värme, Kyla, Kraftvärme och Process. Som Sveriges ledande energikonsult har vi en arbetsmodell som ökar effektiviteten, reducerar kostnaderna och minskar miljöpåverkan. Alla kunder är olika och alla uppdrag är unika. Behoven, kraven och önskemålen styrs av de lokala förutsättningarna. Men ett är gemensamt och det är vår omsorg om helheten. Vår förmåga att med smart teknik skapa hållbara och samordnade lösningar – tekniskt, ekonomiskt och miljömässigt. Vi kallar det Energilösningar i kubik.

Items.Name: GeKu UK Ltd
Items.Description:
Geku Automation are a leading UK based Robot integrator and Automation supplier 
providing automation solutions to all sectors of manufacturing industry. 
Whatever your requirements, from the smallest of peripheral handling equipment 
to a full turnkey production system, Geku can offer a solution. Our experienced 
team of design engineers will find a way to automate your application in the 
best and most cost effective way.  Your system will be fully proven and tested 
at our UK headquarters before installation and after delivery, our service team 
will ensure you maintain maximum uptime. We pride ourselves on our commitment 
and ongoing support to our customers. 
We design, build and test from our Rochester Factory, automation systems for 
all sectors of industry:

Aerospace
Medical
Foundry
Plastics
Diecasting
Automotive
Agricultural

Items.Description: Other supported ABB Products: Maestro-UX, Melody, Contronic P

Items.Name: ghv GmbH
Items.Description: GHV Antriebstechnik - Automation Vertriebs GmbH ist Profi in der Beratung und in dem Vertrieb von Antriebstechnik und Automatisierungssystemen. Als Antriebsspezialist seit 1976 tätig bietet ghv Kompetenz und technisches know how in allen Antriebsfragen. GHV Produkte sind: * Getriebe- und Drehstrommotore * AC / DC Servoantriebe * Frequenzumrichter * Controller und Sensoren * Stirn- Kettenräder, * Zahnscheiben und Zahnriemen * Kupplungen * Spannsätze und Lineareinheiten GHV ist Systemlieferant mit Systemverantwortung, der Einsatz von Spitzenprodukten führender Hersteller mit kurzfristiger Verfügbarkeit ist selbstverständlich. Weltweiter Service rundet das Angebot ab.

Items.Name: Gibbons Engineering Group Ltd
Items.Description: Gibbons Engineering Group Ltd are a specialist electrical and mechanical engineering company, based in Essex, supplying variable speed drive solutions to industry.

Items.Name: Goodtech AS
Items.Description: We design and supply everything from turnkey systems to conversion and modernisation of existing systems. We have extensive experience of automation within many areas, everything from mines and steelworks, paper and pulp factories to signalling systems for infrastructure, as well as logistics solutions, production and power and heating distribution, as well as gas and oil. Naturally, we can also take care of your needs for operation, servicing and support.

Items.Name: GPA Gesellschaft für Prozesstechnik und Automation mbH
Items.Description:
CHEMIE  +  PAPIER  +   AUTOMOBIL  +   PHARMA

Automatisierungstechnik von der Planungsphase bis zur Inbetriebnahme und Wartung

- ganzheitliche Kompetenz für ganze Lösungen.
  
• Erfahrung mit ABB 800xA (AC 800M-Controller und AC460), Advant/MOD300, Safety und Freelance
• Projekte mit Validierung nach 21CFR Part11 und GAMP
• herstellerunabhängige Systemlösungen

Items.Name: Graniten Engineering Ab
Items.Description:
We at Granite has the privilege to think smart, think long, think again. That 
is, think of new technology - of existing components, new components and items 
that are not yet available. We have enough genius and madness to invent the 
wheel again. Or roll it into a machine solution has not yet seen before in the 
world. Our team of developers, designers, testers and other thinkers know no 
bounds. There is a smarter way.

Items.Name: Granitor Robotics AB
Items.Description:
Over the past decade, we have developed strongly in close cooperation with Volvo Cars, which today is the largest customer. Other automotive and manufacturing industries in Sweden and internationally also account for an important part of our business. We have today continued to focus on Robot automation in the automotive and manufacturing industries where the absolute majority is in body production and a broader offering in assembly and packing automation. Our ambition is to benefit from our long experience in developing efficient customized robot-based automation solutions adapted to the customer's unique needs where we use modern digital tools for the best efficiency.

 

Our organization consists of leading experienced employees in the most critical competence areas for our business. Our strategy is to develop and deliver complete customized functional solutions at a fixed price. We purchase and integrate process equipment, robots and subsystems. We design and manufacture customized equipment to deliver as efficient a complete solution as possible to the customer.
